s0051: The Grand Historian says: Warfare unites with orthodox, conquers with unorthodox.
s0052: Those skilled at it, unorthodox emerges without limit.
s0053: Unorthodox and orthodox cycle producing each other, like a ring without end.
s0054: At first like virgin, enemy opens door;
s0055: Later like escaped rabbit, enemy cannot catch: this describes Tian Dan!
s0056: Initially, when Zhao Chi killed King Min, Ju people sought King Min's son Fa Zhang, found him at Grand Historian Xi's home, working as gardener.
s0057: Xi's daughter pitied and treated him well.
s0058: Later Fa Zhang privately told his feelings to the girl, she then consorted with him.
s0059: When Ju people together established Fa Zhang as Qi king, to defend Ju against Yan, Grand Historian Xi's daughter became queen, called 'Queen of the King.'
s0060: When Yan first entered Qi, heard Hua county man Wang Xu worthy, ordered army: 'Circle Hua county thirty li no entry,' because of Wang Xu.
s0061: Then sent people to tell Xu: 'Qi people much praise your righteousness, I appoint you general, enfeoff you ten thousand households.'
s0063: Yan people said: 'If you do not listen, I lead three armies to butcher Hua county.'
s0064: Wang Xu said: 'Loyal minister does not serve two lords, chaste woman does not take two husbands.'
s0065: Qi king did not listen to my advice, thus retired to farm in wilds.'
s0066: State already broken perished, I could not preserve it;
s0067: Now again coerce with arms to be lord's general, this assists tyrant in violence.'
s0068: Better than living without righteousness, certainly rather boiled!'
s0069: Thus hanged his neck on tree branch, struggled and broke neck died.
s0070: Qi perished ministers heard of this, said: 'Wang Xu, commoner also, righteousness does not face north to Yan, how much more those in office eating salary!'
s0071: Thus gathered at Ju, sought the princes, established as King Xiang.
